sentence.short: Choose the best plan for you.
sentence.medium: Explore our variety of plans tailored to your needs.
sentence.long: Our pricing plans are designed to cater to varying user preferences and engagement levels.

plans.title-medium: Start Earning with the Basic Plan
plans.sentence-short: Perfect for beginners starting their journey.

plans.title-medium: Unlock More with the Pro Plan
plans.sentence-short: Ideal for regular users seeking higher rewards.

plans.title-medium: Maximize Earnings with the Gold Plan
plans.sentence-short: For avid users who want maximum benefits.
plans.feature-3: Access to premium games and surveys

plans.title-medium: The Ultimate Earning Experience: VIP Plan
plans.sentence-short: For serious earners looking for exclusive perks.
plans.feature-3: Invitations to special events and webinars
